channel.title: Best/Worst Forum Mafia Quotes
channel.description:
From [SFoL 20 RPG](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-20-fol-rpg-night-4/57918/3467?u=pug)
[quote="Pug, post:3467, topic:57918, full:true"] Marl, imprison me like one of your french girls [/quote]
[quote="Margaret, post:3469, topic:57918"] Marl, imprison me like one of your french girls :wink: [/quote]
[quote="Margaret, post:3470, topic:57918, full:true"] H0t [/quote]
This thread was made for when someone says some insanely stupid or good shit that you want to remember.

item.title: Best/Worst Forum Mafia Quotes
item.dc:creator: Atlas
item.description:
For context, Hells Librarian punishes people who speak after ST calls for silence

[Misc] BotF X - New World Chaos - Game Thread (Evil Wins)

The lights go out.

Silence!

[Misc] BotF X - New World Chaos - Game Thread (Evil Wins)

The person is literally told what they have to avoid disagreeing with to avoid execution. How isn’t that useless? Just don’t mention the topic you need to avoid disagreeing with. It isn’t hard.

[Misc] BotF X - New World Chaos - Game Thread (Evil Wins)

The Hell’s Librarian growls at you.

[Misc] BotF X - New World Chaos - Game Thread (Evil Wins)

Right now people should be considering worlds where I’m sleeper and worlds where I’m agitprop equally, not talking like I’m outed evil like they have been.

[Misc] BotF X - New World Chaos - Game Thread (Evil Wins)

night 3 begins.

[Misc] BotF X - New World Chaos - Game Thread (Evil Wins)

They literally would considering they would be considering worlds where I’m sleeper instead of considering me outed agitprop.

[Misc] BotF X - New World Chaos - Game Thread (Evil Wins)

LEAFIA

STOP TALKING

I’m risking my very life

BE QUIET

[Misc] BotF X - New World Chaos - Game Thread (Evil Wins)

The Hell’s Librarian decides that Leafia, once she dies, loses her ghost vote.

who could’ve guessed that would happen

Read full topic

item.title: Best/Worst Forum Mafia Quotes
item.dc:creator: WindwardAway
item.description:
you forgot the follow-up

[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!

That’s something I wasn’t expecting. Was anyone else really amused by Will’s v flip after me and Arctic spent a while EoD arguing over who would get Will’s pelt?

I’ve also thought it over during the night and decided to let Arctic have Will’s pelt. j/k

[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!
[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!

I’ve also thought it over during the night and decided to let Arctic have Will’s pelt. j/k

you know what, i’m feeling generous today
you can have all of it

Read full topic

item.title: Best/Worst Forum Mafia Quotes
item.dc:creator: Arctic
item.description:
leafia Moment

[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!

one last thing
the will pelt is undoubtedly, incontrovertibly and unequivocally MINE

bye losers
(unless proph answers)

[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!

I think I’ve been pushing Will both today and yesterday the most out of anybody so I think it rightfully belongs to me here.

[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!

I was pushing Will at EoD 1 and now again today. I honestly don’t remember very many more ppl people pushing on Will very hard althoughough I’m willing to share it with you and Marl at least.

[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!


best i can do is 5% for you and 5% for marl

[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!

Don’t act like you were the main pusher on Will Arctic.

[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!

yes i was i literally cased him day 1

tell you what, you get 3%
final offer

[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!

Willtaylor has been executed! He was:

willtaylor flip

The Albino

Vanilla Town

[VFM] Town vs Bandits - Day 5 (4/13) - Bandits Win!

Thats what he did as a wolf in meotainado so he must be a wolf here too!

/vote arcitc

Looking forward to solving the game with you guys!

item.title: Best/Worst Forum Mafia Quotes
item.dc:creator: EliThePsycho
item.description:
i present to you
all instances of leafia TMI that i could find in sfol 67
with some coconuts mixed in

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

Not a good idea honestly. I would say someone could just check me tonight, but look at the Visionary role. Someone could just say that I’m that that decided to show up as the role I am to checks, so a check on me wouldn’t be clearing. Right now, only PKR and Gghana really stand out to me and not in a good way mind you.

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

I do think knowing the alignment of the one who did the bleed could help us though.

Are there any Hand of Byzantium classes that can bleed targets during the day?

I know BD has the heroine which can do it.

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

Watch her be evil and end up using that on the Visionary. That would be hilareous. Laughs

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

If BD spawned I mean.

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

It’s ppl ossible, but unlikely I think and even if they do, it’ll be a good look for Coconuts and Intensify, two slots that I’m a bit conflicted on at the moment. So it’s a win/win in my eyes.

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

It felt like you were possibly coaching him a bit with how you were acting towards him earlier but it could just be my imagination.

On another topic

I bled Gorta and killed Atlas sorry

On another topic

Wait right dead interaction

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

Nah. They’d night kill you via strongmanning if th er y believed you were NK.

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

If they are told they were occupied upon selecting a neutral for eliminate, then it stands to reason that they get told that they tried to eliminate a neutral.

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

Visionary. Action was to use Sigil of Illusion on someone. Not sure I should say who though.

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

Hmmm, Kyo is pretty much locktown after N2 and socially as well, and while they’re a good candidate for having been converted N3 if that was a conversion night, I feel it’s sort of unlikely that the Visionary converted him because of how likely it was that he’d die to the reaper last night and who’s Pokemon?

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

Wrong Wazza. You’re not town. You know what, congrats on your NK win.

[SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III - Endgame - The Unseen and The Senex are victorious!

In fact, the only way I’d push Wazza this hard if I was Visionary, would be if my heroine tried using eliminate on him at some point in the game and found that he was a neutral.

Read full topic

PokemonKidRyan
PokemonKidRyan
PokemonKidRyan

Rwby fm - wolves win! at least it wasnt a ******* scumstomp

im mafia

why does pkr only ever show up when we talk about him he’s like bloody mary

Rwby fm - wolves win! at least it wasnt a ******* scumstomp

I am still around fwiw.
This… discussion has been fascinating.
Like, Vul’s actually looking into this in depth and kind of understanding how I feel and what I’m thinking.
It’s weird to see something right?

Rwby fm - wolves win! at least it wasnt a ******* scumstomp

if you look into a mirror and say pokemonkidryan 3 times a gay english dude in a fursuit appears out of nowhere and refuses to give reads
